Description: 34 very small barrel shaped beads made of light green turquoise glazed faience. At the widest part a circumferential white band with a width of 1mm. Some of the beads contain a very thin (hair like) line within the white band that was originally probably black like for EA87229 but is now faded.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
